title: request_from_archive Lambda Input
description: The input for the request_from_archive Lambda.

granules.description: A list of objects representing individual files to restore.

granuleId.description: The id of the granule being restored.

keys.description: Keys related to where the files will be located.

key.description: Key to the file within the granule.

destBucket.description: The bucket the restored file will be moved to after the restore completes.
